{"id":888659707,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1675157720,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/888659707/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        double ans = 1.0;\n\n        long long nn = n;\n        if(nn < 0) nn = -1 * nn;\n\n        while(nn > 0) {\n            if(nn % 2 == 0) {\n                x = x * x;\n                nn /= 2;\n            }\n\n            else {\n                ans = ans * x;\n                nn--;\n            }\n        }\n\n        if(n < 0) ans = 1.0/ans;\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false}
